data_type: personal information client collect from you be
text: If you are a Referee, Martian Logic may hold Personal Information that a Client collects from you that is reasonably necessary for a Client to determine a Candidate's suitability for work.

Martian Logic may also collect and use Personal Information from a Candidate for the purpose of conducting a Nationally Coordinated Criminal History Check through the National Police Checking Service on behalf of a Client.

Martian Logic treats Personal Information obtained for or a result from a Nationally Coordinated Criminal History Check with the utmost confidence and will only disclose this information in accordance with consent given by the Candidate or as required by law.

Martian Logic also collects, holds, uses, and discloses Personal Information obtained from Candidates to conduct Nationally Coordinated Criminal History Checks through the National Police Checking Service.
When making a complaint to Martian Logic about privacy, please give us sufficient detail to be able to identify your concerns and respond appropriately.

If we are not able to provide access to your information, we will provide you with our written reasons.
If we refuse to correct your Personal Information, we will give you written reasons.
